title: Integrations
description: With service integration, you can connect different solutions.
deleteIntegrationDescription: You are about to delete your {{type}} integration. Do you wish to continue?
deleteIntegrationToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while deleting your integration
addIntegrationToastErrorTitle: An error occurred while creating your integration
addIntegrationDescription: Add an integration between two services. Only services with a compatible network are available.
addIntegrationNoServiceAlertDescription: You do not have any eligible services to create this integration. Please create a service with a network configuration similar to this service, and with one of the following engines:
integrationTypeDescription-kafkaLogs: Send logs in a Kafka cluster
integrationTypeDescription-grafanaDashbo: View metrics on a Grafana dashboard
integrationTypeDescription-kafkaConnect: Connect external systems to a Kafka cluster
